The first ReplanEU seminar: "L'Europa e il rapporto tra l'uomo e l'ambiente" took place on Wednesday 2 November 17:45 at Manifattura Tabacchi, via delle Cascine 35 - Firenze. I talked about European policies to tackle climate change with Mario Pagano, Annika Frosch and Caterina Taurelli Salimbeni.![](images/picture.jpg)
